name: Mithril Sword
description: A sword forged of magical silver, that is both light and sturdy.

name: Sandy's Sword
description: A blade belonging to a woman warrior who is said to be the only one ever to reach the bottom of the Dungeon.

name: Small strength Sword
description: A cheap sword that improves strength.

name: Big strength Sword
description: A large sword that improves strength.

name: Earth Breaker
description: A legendary sword that improves strength.

name: Small intelligence Sword
description: A cheap sword that improves intelligence.

name: Elegant intelligence Sword
description: A high quality sword that improves intelligence.

name: Arcane Blade
description: A legendary sword that improves intelligence.

name: Small spirit Sword
description: A cheap sword that improves spirit.

name: Glowing spirit Sword
description: A shining sword that improves spirit.

name: Justice
description: A legendary sword that improves spirit.

name: Small will Sword
description: A cheap sword that improves will.

name: Sharp will Sword
description: A sturdy sword that improves will.

name: Eternity
description: A legendary sword that improves will.

name: Cracked Plate
description: It looks like it will fall apart as soon as something hits it.

name: Thin Plate
description: Not very strong, but it can at least take a hit.

name: Steel Plate
description: A sturdy design that has kept many people safe.

name: Gold Plate
description: Protection fit for royalty - at least until the gold peels off.
